1.0.name: wordpress/zd-dugg
1.0.description:
A sidebar widget that allows you to list topics which you have dugg, a list of popular diggs, and a list of upcoming diggs on digg.com

Thanks to Justin for building this quick and easy digg API class. *http://www.jaslabs.com *Justin Silverton *justin@jaslabs.com

Thanks to Chris for starting off this digg widget using the javascript method. *Chris Black *http://cjbonline.org
